Desc.entry: Provides supported accommodation for 20 young single people aged 16-21 years with the aim of re-establishing them in their own accommodation within the community. Residents are helped with practical and emotional needs. Accommodation by referral from the local authority or a voluntary agency. Company limited by guarantee no 04625577 and registered charity.

ContactName.entry: Chris Ward, General Manager/Angela Grayson, Service Manager

category.entry: HOUSING, ADVICE AND SUPPORT FOR HOMELESS OR VULNERABLE PEOPLE
